article: Once a wise man was traveling with some of his . They  _  to pass a lake and they stopped there for a  _  . The man told one of his disciples," I'm  _  . So remember, the next time a(n)  _  has you all , just let it be; don't  _  immediately. Let the Mud settle and come back to the situation  _  .
